column1: Uchi////What really bothered me about this place
column2: and probably gives Uchi the distinction of being the most pretentious restaurant in Houston
column3: is how unbelievably small the portions are.  Each one is two bites.  I am not kidding.  You could get more food grazing the free samples at Central Market or Whole Foods.  And
column5: it would be just as tasty.
